title: A cry for help or avoiding a lawsuit???
itunes:title: A cry for help or avoiding a lawsuit???
description:
Monday 11/28- After Kanye West's recent rants and cancelling his tour, the Breakfast Club discuss with listeners whether Ye's recent behavior is a cry for help or a way to avoid being sued. Also Envy, Angela and Charlamagne talk about Sean Paul being under fire for comments he made on the show about oral sex. An early candidate for Donkey of the Week is established and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
